menu.logAttention: Logs are not sent automatically, so please send them to the developer if necessary.

top.description: Gakuya is packaging tool for UTAU VoiceBanks
top.selectZipButtonText: Agree to the terms of use and Select the UTAU VoiceBanks zip file
top.ruleDescription: Only voice sources with permission from the voice rights holder may be used.
top.ruleDescription2: If you wish to use someone else's voice, you must obtain their explicit permission.
top.privacyAnalytics: This website uses Google's access analysis tool "Google Analytics." Google Analytics uses cookies to collect data. This data is collected anonymously and does not identify individuals.
top.privacyCookie: We use cookies on our site to customize how you experience our site.

footer.disclaimer: UTAU is a singing voice synthesis software created for Windows and published by 飴屋／菖蒲
footer.disclaimer2: This software is not affiliated with UTAU official.

loadZipDialog.title: Read Zip
loadZipDialog.reload: Reload with the specified character code

error.title: Error
error.message: An unexpected error has occurred. Please download the log from the button below and send it to the developer.
